name: dnd.info
desc: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.

team_id.desc: Encoded team id where passed in user param belongs, required if org token is used. If no user param is passed, then a team which has access to the app should be passed.

user.desc: User to fetch status for (defaults to current user).

errors.user_not_visible: User is not visible for this request.
